alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 07 at 2:36AM EST until March 07 at 4:45AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central Indiana and west central Indiana, including the following counties, in central Indiana, Hancock, Hendricks, Johnson, Marion, Morgan and Shelby. In west central Indiana, Owen and Putnam. * WHEN...Until 630 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 236 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
